"Gah... Hah...!": "Hahah, this is some warm welcome. Guess it's not too bad knowing we've pissed them off this much."
"...It is rather nostalgic. We once stayed behind in order to allow everyone to escape."
"Now we're luring them out so they don't cause problems for the others... But man, there's no end."
"My bad, Casra. You always have the crappiest luck when you're paired up with me."
"No need to apologize. However, do not try to take them all on by yourself, like you did last time."
"Your wife would surely kill you if you did that."
